name: Captain Cappon (version 0.3.1)
description:
Cappon is a boy who is stuck on the Crown Isles, high up in the sky. His mission is to get back down to the ground. That is no easy task, but with Cappon's spin ability, he'll do it in no time! Try to beat the game as quickly as possible!

Update Notes:
Second stage added
Green stars added
Animation fixes
Quit button removed
Spin ability improved
New logo
Enter for Pause instead of Escape
Skip key added to title screen and conversations (Enter)
